name: Tourist Trap (esseygames)
description:
Control a group of tourists who have been trapped in a dungeon! You are their tour guide. Use the arrow keys to move the group of tourists around. You can use walls to strategically position tourists, but watch out for the spikes!

To leave a level, move your tourists onto the blue switches. They must make it out together!

Good luck and have fun. Made by EsseyGames, ages 11 and 12 with some help from their dad.
